item.title: Game of the Month
item.description:
Ethan Samuels Delivers Impressive Victory in Round 3 of 2025 CTCF Club League

Steinitz board 2, Ethan Samuels, delivered a fine victory with the black pieces against Dr. Shabier Bhawoodien of Manyanani Chess Club in Round 3 of the 2025 CTCF Club League. In a Kingâ€™s Indian Defence, Ethan showed patience in defence and precision in the endgame to secure the point.
